personal.name: Vishnu Gajulapalli
personal.title: Backend Engineer
personal.bio: Backend Engineer with 2+ years of professional experience architecting scalable distributed systems. Proven track record of leading technical initiatives, optimizing system performance, and delivering high-impact solutions that scale to millions of users.

achievements.title: Technical Leadership & Architecture
achievements.description: Led architectural decisions for 3 major projects, mentored 2 junior developers, and established coding standards that reduced bug reports by 40%

achievements.title: Performance Engineering Excellence
achievements.description: Optimized critical path performance across 15+ microservices, achieving 75% reduction in P99 latency (500ms → 125ms) through database indexing, query optimization, and strategic caching

achievements.title: Scalability & Reliability Champion
achievements.description: Designed fault-tolerant systems handling 10x traffic growth (1K → 10K concurrent users) with zero downtime migrations and comprehensive monitoring

achievements.title: Innovation in Data Processing
achievements.description: Architected real-time data pipeline processing 500M+ events/day using Kafka streams, reducing data processing latency from 5 minutes to 30 seconds

achievements.title: DevOps & Infrastructure Automation
achievements.description: Implemented Infrastructure-as-Code reducing deployment time from 4 hours to 15 minutes, and established CI/CD pipelines with 95% test automation coverage

projects.title: Scalable Real-time Chat Platform
projects.description: Enterprise-grade messaging system serving 10K+ concurrent users with WebSocket clustering, message persistence, and AI-powered moderation. Implemented horizontal scaling with Redis pub/sub and MongoDB sharding.
projects.imageAlt: Screenshot of real-time chat platform interface showing message threads and user list

projects.title: Microservices Platform
projects.description: Scalable camping platform with JWT authentication, geospatial search, and real-time reviews.
projects.imageAlt: Screenshot of YelpCamp platform showing camping site listings with photos and reviews

projects.title: High-Performance Color API
projects.description: Ultra-fast API serving color palettes with intelligent caching, handling 1M+ requests daily.
projects.imageAlt: Screenshot of color picker application showing generated color palettes and API interface

experience.title: Backend Engineer
experience.description: Leading full-stack architecture decisions for scalable applications. Designed and implemented distributed systems serving 100K+ users with focus on performance, reliability, and maintainability.
achievements: Architected real-time chat system scaling from 0 to 10K+ concurrent users, implementing WebSocket clustering with Redis pub/sub for horizontal scaling
Designed microservices architecture handling 1M+ API requests/day with 99.5% uptime, implementing circuit breakers and graceful degradation
Led performance optimization initiative reducing average API response time from 200ms to 45ms through caching strategies and database query optimization
Implemented ML-powered recommendation engine increasing user engagement by 35% over 6-month period (baseline: 2.3 min/session → 3.1 min/session)

experience.title: Backend Engineering Intern
experience.description: Developed ETL pipelines and optimized database performance for enterprise applications.
achievements: Developed ETL pipelines processing 1M+ records daily with 99.5% accuracy
Optimized database queries reducing average response time by 60%
Implemented monitoring solutions using Grafana and Prometheus
Collaborated on enterprise integration projects with cross-functional teams

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science
education.details: Focus: Software Engineering, Data Structures, Database Systems
